game.name: Shark Rain
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A Shark-Based Shooter game! Flood the world, Swim, Jump and collect gems through many different levels! Use the force of water to solve puzzles and destroy your enemies!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A Shark-Based Shooter game! Flood the world, Swim, Jump and collect gems through many different levels! Use the force of water to solve puzzles and destroy your enemies!
